name: Data Model
description: What structural characteristics that the data model have.

subcriteria.name: Many-to-many
subcriteria.description: How well many-to-many relationships (including entities with properties) are modelled.

subcriteria.name: One-to-many
subcriteria.description: How well one-to-many relationships (including entities with properties) are modelled.

subcriteria.name: Flexibility
subcriteria.description: If you need your data model to support schema on read flexilibity.

name: Performance
description: How fast the database is and how much load it can take.

subcriteria.name: Read
subcriteria.description: How fast the data models reads data.

subcriteria.name: Write
subcriteria.description: How fast the data models inserts and updates data.

subcriteria.name: Scalability
subcriteria.description: How well the data model can scale up to support more intensive loads.

name: Transactions
description: To what extent the data model can perform transactions, and how well those transactions perform.
